name: Santa vs the Zombies
description:
Based on the popular Super Crate Box, Santa vs the Zombies: The Last Christmas, is an all action twitch based shooter with a retro feel and an array of weapons, deadly Zombies and Reindeers for you to stop. Collect as many presents as you can to save Christmas!

  • Arcade action gameplay with cartoon-style visuals and simple controls
    • Retro feel to the game play. Pick up and play fun
    • 2 levels. Normal and Insane
    • Stat count. Keep track of your kills and collected presents
